## Functions:
- Help functions: simulates mutations based on branch length, 
- Simulates DNA sequence based on a fixed population size
- Simulates DNA sequence based on a variable (continuous) population size
- Simulates DNA sequence based on a variable (bottleneck) population size
- Various functions that provides different properties of the simulated data
